Reviews.Title: Sent them back!
Reviews.Author: DVB
Reviews.Content: I ordered this and it was taking way too long for the seller to mail it out. I cancelled the order and then the seller sent it anyway. I was very upset about that and I sent it back as soon as it got here. I was not satisfied with the other 2 previous cables that I received from them anyway because I was not able to connect them to another cable via a BNC adapter.

ProductInfo.Features:
•Premium quality Pre-made Siamese Cable with both BNC and Power Connectors for Ultimate Performance
•The 75 Ohm video conductor is surrounded by a heavy braided shield that provides maximum protection from stray RF (radio frequency), digital processing and radiated power signals
•Easy connection from a CCTV/Surveillance Camera to a Digital Video Recorder (DVR) and Power Supply
•Simplify installation by using a single cable for both power and video
LOT OF 2 - FREE 2 RCA ADAPTERS WITH EACH CABLE
ProductInfo.Name: Cables Direct Online- LOT OF 2 WHITE 50ft PREMIUM QUALITY PRE-MADE SECURITY CAMERA VIDEO POWER CABLE RG59 + 18/2
